statements: SELECT student_id, student_name, grade, attendance FROM students;
SELECT student_name, grade, student_id, attendance FROM students;
SELECT student_id, grade, student_name, attendance FROM students;
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT student_id, student_name FROM students;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_name = 'Alice';
SELECT student_id, student_name, grade FROM students WHERE grade = 'A' AND attendance = True;
SELECT student_name, grade FROM students ORDER BY student_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE student_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT COUNT(*) AS total_students FROM students
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT id, name, grade FROM students WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT name, grade FROM students WHERE attendance = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM students ORDER BY name ASC;
SELECT course_name, credits FROM courses WHERE credits >= 3;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT id, name, grade FROM students WHERE attendance = TRUE ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT name, grade, attendance FROM students WHERE grade >= 70 AND attendance = FALSE;
SELECT course_name, credits, instructor FROM courses WHERE credits > 3 ORDER BY course_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM students JOIN courses ON students.grade = courses.credits;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, grade FROM Students ORDER BY grade DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE instructor='John Doe';
SELECT student_id, name FROM Students WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT enrollment_id, enrollment_date FROM Enrollments ORDER BY enrollment_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM Students WHERE grade > 75 ORDER BY name DESC;

SELECT student_id, name, course_name FROM Students JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE grade >= 80 ORDER BY name ASC;

SELECT Students.name, Courses.course_name, Enrollments.enrollment_date FROM Students, Courses, Enrollments WHERE Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id AND Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id AND attendance = 'Present' ORDER BY enrollment_date DESC;

SELECT Students.name, Courses.course_name, Enrollments.enrollment_date FROM Students INNER JOIN Enrollments ON Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id INNER JOIN Courses ON Enrollments.course_id = Courses.course_id WHERE grade BETWEEN 70 AND 90 ORDER BY Students.name ASC, Courses.course_name DESC;

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT Students.name) AS total_students, COUNT(DISTINCT Courses.course_name) AS total_courses FROM Students, Courses, Enrollments WHERE Students.student_id = Enrollments.student_id AND Courses.course_id = Enrollments.course_id;
SELECT * FROM Students;
SELECT name, grade FROM Students WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT student_id, name, grade FROM Students WHERE attendance = TRUE;
SELECT * FROM Courses ORDER BY course_name DESC;
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE instructor = 'John Doe';
SELECT name, grade FROM Students WHERE student_id = 1
SELECT course_name, instructor FROM Courses WHERE course_id = 3
SELECT student_id, score FROM Grades WHERE course_id = 2 ORDER BY score DESC
SELECT student_id, course_id, date FROM Attendance WHERE student_id = 4 AND date > '2022-01-01'
SELECT name, grade FROM Students WHERE grade >= 90
SELECT * FROM students;
SELECT name, grade FROM students WHERE grade > 80;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credits FROM courses ORDER BY credits DESC;
SELECT student_id, enrollment_date FROM enrollments WHERE enrollment_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT student_id, course_id, attendance_date FROM attendance WHERE student_id = 123;
SELECT * FROM students WHERE grade > 90 ORDER BY name DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT name, grade, attendance FROM students WHERE attendance = TRUE AND grade < 70 ORDER BY grade ASC LIMIT 3;
SELECT course_name, instructor, credits FROM courses WHERE credits BETWEEN 3 AND 5 ORDER BY course_name LIMIT 5;

SELECT e.enrollment_id, s.name, c.course_name, e.enrollment_date FROM enrollments e JOIN students s ON e.student_id = s.student_id JOIN courses c ON e.course_id = c.course_id WHERE e.enrollment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31' ORDER BY e.enrollment_date DESC LIMIT 10;

SELECT a.attendance_id, s.name AS student_name, c.course_name, a.attendance_date FROM attendance a JOIN students s ON a.student_id = s.student_id JOIN courses c ON a.course_id = c.course_id ORDER BY a.attendance_date DESC LIMIT 5;
